## Security Checklist

If this PR involves cryptographic code:

- [ ] Uses established libraries (Web Crypto API, @noble/*)
- [ ] No custom cryptographic algorithm implementations
- [ ] Uses authenticated encryption (AES-GCM, not AES-CBC)
- [ ] IVs are randomly generated and never reused
- [ ] All inputs are validated
- [ ] Error messages don't leak sensitive information
- [ ] Tests cover edge cases and invalid inputs
